Key Match Events: Shivam Dube played an unbeaten 60 to help India win the match
68-run partnership between Mohammad Nabi and Azmatullah Omarzai lifted Afghanistan to 158 for five
Miscellaneous Highlights: India's fringe players, led by Shivam Dube, made the opportunity count to set up a six-wicket win over Afghanistan
The start of the game was delayed by a few minutes as a flickering blue light around the sightscreen distracted Gurbaz
Others: India's Mukesh Kumar and Axar Patel performed well with the ball
India dropped three catches in the biting cold of Mohali
Opener Yashasvi Jaiswal was unavailable for selection due to a sore right groin
